Sentence_0: Federal Register, Volume 86 Issue 29 (Tuesday, February 16, 2021) [Federal Register Volume 86, Number 29 (Tuesday, February 16, 2021)] [Notices] [Page 9543] From the Federal Register Online via the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov] [FR Doc No: 2021-03002] ---------------------------------------------------------------------- NATIONAL ARCHIVES AND RECORDS ADMINISTRATION [NARA-2021-017] National Industrial Security Program Policy Advisory Committee (NISPPAC) Meeting AGENCY: Information Security Oversight Office (ISOO), National Archives and Records Administration (NARA).
Sentence_1: ACTION: Notice of Federal Advisory Committee meeting
Sentence_2: ---------------------------------------------------------------------- SUMMARY: We are announcing an upcoming meeting of the National Industrial Security Program Policy Advisory Committee (NISPPAC).
Sentence_3: DATES: The meeting will be on April 14, 2021, from 10:00 a
Sentence_4: ADDRESSES: The April 14, 2021, meeting will be a virtual meeting. See supplementary procedures below.
Sentence_5: FOR FURTHER INFORMATION CONTACT: Heather Harris Pag[aacute]n, ISOO Program Analyst, by telephone at 202^357.5351, or by email at NISPPAC@nara.gov.
Sentence_6: SUPPLEMENTARY INFORMATION: This meeting is open to the public in accordance with the Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U. app 2) and implementing regulations at 41 CFR 101-6^ The Committee will discuss National Industrial Security Program policy matters.
Sentence_7: Procedures: You must register in advance through the Event Services link https://ems8.intellor.com?do=register&t=1&p=836856 if you wish to attend. NISPPAC members, ISOO employees, and speakers should send an email to NISPPAC@nara.gov for the appropriate registration information instead of registering with the above link. Contact us via email at NISPPAC@nara.gov with any questions.
